changeSet.author: hhildebrand
changeSet.sql: CREATE TYPE reference_type AS ENUM ( 'Child Sequencing Authorization', 'Facet', 'Network Attribute Authorization', 'Network Authorization', 'Network', 'Existential', 'Job Chronology', 'Job', 'Meta Protocol', 'Network Inference', 'Parent Sequencing Authorization', 'Protocol', 'Self Sequencing Authorization', 'Sibling Sequencing Authorization', 'Status Code Sequencing' );
